Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc12
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.Controller.Server.GameStates

Class PlayerTurnDrawState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.Controller.Server.GameStates.GameState
it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.Controller.Server.GameStates.PlayerTurnDrawState
public class PlayerTurnDrawState extends GameState
Represents the game state where players draw cards during their turn. This state handles drawing cards from various decks and placed resources.

  • Field Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • PlayerTurnDrawState

      public PlayerTurnDrawState(GameController controller, Game thisGame)
      Constructs a PlayerTurnDrawState object with the specified controller and game. Initializes the drawing actions for resource cards, gold cards, and placed resources and golds.
      Parameters:
      controller - The GameController managing the game flow.
      thisGame - The current Game instance.

  • Method Details

    • drawFrom

      public void drawFrom(InGamePlayer target, String deck) throws UnexpectedPlayerException, UnknownStringException, EmptyDeckException
      Handles the action of a player drawing a card from a specific deck during their turn. Verifies the target player and the deck type, then adds the drawn card to the player's hand.
      Overrides:
      drawFrom in class GameState
      Parameters:
      target - The player performing the draw action.
      deck - The type of deck from which to draw ("RESOURCE" or "GOLD").
      Throws:
      UnexpectedPlayerException - If the player attempting to draw is not the current player.
      UnknownStringException - If an unknown deck type string is provided.
      EmptyDeckException - If the specified deck is empty.

    • drawFrom

      public void drawFrom(InGamePlayer target, String whichType, int position) throws UnexpectedPlayerException, InvalidDeckPositionException, UnknownStringException, EmptyDeckException
      Handles the action of a player drawing a card from a specific placed deck during their turn. Verifies the target player, deck type, and position, then adds the drawn card to the player's hand.
      Overrides:
      drawFrom in class GameState
      Parameters:
      target - The player performing the draw action.
      whichType - The type of placed deck from which to draw ("RESOURCE" or "GOLD").
      position - The position within the placed deck from which to draw (0 or 1).
      Throws:
      UnexpectedPlayerException - If the player attempting to draw is not the current player.
      InvalidDeckPositionException - If an invalid position within the placed deck is specified.
      UnknownStringException - If an unknown deck type string is provided.
      EmptyDeckException - If the specified placed deck is empty.

    • playerDisconnected

      public void playerDisconnected(InGamePlayer target)
      Handles the disconnection of a player during their turn. Automatically tries to draw a card for the disconnected player following the implemented routine.
      Specified by:
      playerDisconnected in class GameState
      Parameters:
      target - The player who disconnected.

    • transition

      public void transition()
      Handles the transition to the next state after the current player's turn. Updates the game state based on the current game conditions, eventually skipping disconnected players and setting the final phase if the conditions are met.
      Specified by:
      transition in class GameState
